author: vors
body:
## Steps to reproduce

On OS X should open Finder in the curent folder (like `/usr/bin/open`)

``` powershell
ii .
```
## Expected behavior

open Finder in the current folder 
## Actual behavior

Noop
## Environment data

v0.3.0

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Not working as expected on both Linux and OSX. Invoke-Item is leaving defunct processes on every call.

comments.author: ealexjordan
comments.body: Fix ready to go for OSX and Linux. While writing tests found that Invoke-Item was broken on ALL platforms. Windows still has an invoke-item bug.

title: Invoke-Item doesn't do anything
